text: Hibrildes norax is a moth in the family Eupterotidae. It was described by Druce in 1888. It is found in the Democratic Republic of Congo (Katanga), Guinea, Malawi, Zambia and Zimbabwe.Afro Moths Adults are semihyaline, the fore- and hindwings uniformly covered with yellowish-white scales, with all the veins light brown.Druce, H. 1887b. Descriptions of some new species of Lepidoptera Heterocera, mostly from tropical Africa. - Proceedings of the Zoological Society of London 1887: 675–676 ==References== Category:Moths described in 1888 Category:Hibrildinae
title: Hibrildes norax
